RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 2, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADULTING prompted the pace two wide to the top of the stretch, gained a narrow lead and edged clear late under left handed urging. DON'T MAKE ME BEG hopped at the start, was quickly taken outside, trailed into the stretch then closed rapidly in the seven path and got up for second. FLYING BUSINESS with the second flight inside, angled out to the five path entering the stretch then finished determinedly three wide. IMMACULATE HEART away alertly, set pace the pace near the inside to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. ANDIAMA close up nearing the quarter pole, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, angled out 5path, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Make Me Beg
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, taken outside, closed fast 7path late, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Immaculate Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Andiama
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up 1/4 pole, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Adulting
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, took over 3/16pole, clear, left urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 11300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDY LITES stalked the pace through the turn, rallied four wide under right handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker and edged clear while drifting out to the seven path nearing the wire. SAUNTER was bumped at the start, allowed to settle, swung wide entering the stretch and closed determinedly in the eighth path to get up for second. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS unhurried early, found her best stride late in the six path. KISS IT GOODBYE pressed the early pace between horses two wide, dropped back on the turn, came on again boldly along the rail but was outfinished. NYSSA made the lead soon after the start, set the pace while getting slow fractions until mid stretch then weakened. RAG TOWN hopped inward bumping SAUNTER at the start and was no threat. BLUE AGAVE pressed the pace three wide into the stretch and gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Lites
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 4 wide right handed urging, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, late gain 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Rag Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped inward, bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonsanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Nyssa
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set slow pace, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss It Goodbye
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, dropped back turn, came again rail, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Agave
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, gave way late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Suc h A Race Since March 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON BUNS was restless in the gate, saved ground into the far turn, shifted out three wide past the five sixteenths marker, rallied to make the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off at will to win as much the best while taken in hand late. POLISHED GEM was fractious in the gate, battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch then was no match for the winner. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT raced widest and went evenly. WHAT'S SO FUNNY dueled for the lead two wide for six furlongs then weakened. CURT'S ANGEL settled three wide into the first turn and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, dueled inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: What's So Funny
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Buns
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, saved ground 2nd turn, surged 3 wide, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Curt's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: No Twowaysaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 2, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 Allow ed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWGIRL KIMMIE prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker then finished full of run under right handed urging to win going away. ROSE RING never far back, dug in late in the seven path and got up for second. SABELLE bobbled out of the gate in front, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. TALKBACK vied for the lead three wide into the stretch and faded late. NATIVE VALLEY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 7path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Talkback
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Sabelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, set pressured pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Native Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 16300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAN MAMIBELLA allowed to settle, closed ground rapidly along the rail through the turn, made the lead entering the stretch and drew off under strong handling. WHOVILLE reared at the start, sped to the lead along the inside before a quarter while under a strong hold, set the pace to the top of the stretch, drifted out to the six path then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. BLACK BUTTE trailed into the stretch, swung wide and passed tiring rivals late. SILVER STICK STAIR had a brief early lead, chased the pace through the turn and gave way in the stretch. LUCKY TO HAVE ME had sped into the turn then wilted.

ENTRY.NAME: Whoville
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, rushed up inside, set pace upper stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Stick Stair
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, chased, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, quick move rail, got through, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky to Have Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Black Butte
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals late outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORESTRIDE away alertly, stalked the pace through the turn, responded readily to make the lead three wide at the top of the stretch and drew off under a hand ride to win as much the best. THRU THE VINE saved ground through the turn, altered course to the six path entering the stretch, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. DYRDEK never far back, improved position 5in the five path in deep stretch. DARK OAK bobbled at the start, trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals. IRISH UNITY away alertly, set a pressured pace near the inside for a half, had speed until mid stretch then weakened. GRAYWING pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Thru the Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground turn, altered course 6path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Unity
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Graywing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Morestride
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, stalked pace, responded 3w, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Dyrdek
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, improved position 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 101. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATOMIC TONE chased the early pace along the inside, rallied to make the lead near the furlong marker and drew off under strong handling. JOHN'S ROCK allowed to settle, swung wide, rallied in the middle of the racetrack through deep stretch and got up for second. FAT DADDY trailed early and closed ground late in the four path. NAUGHTY PRINCE unhurried, trailed on the turn, swung wide and had a mild late rally out past the middle of he racetrack. DAVID'S GEM sped to the lead three wide before a quarter, set the pace until mid stretch then weakened. LATIN SPICE chased the pace three wide into the stretch and then faded. MIGHTY ANGEL chased the pace two wide and weakened late. FIRST CITIZEN well placed, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: David's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, 3 wide, set pace mid stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Naughty Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, trailed turn, swung wide, late gain past mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Atomic Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, perfect trip, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Latin Spice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, rallied mid track, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Fat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, finished well 4path

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Marc h 2 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILENCE trailed for a little over a half mile, rallied steadily circling his field five wide and was along in time. GOLD N SILVER broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. MY BROTHER CAM never far back, finished with good courage four wide. SCORSESE had speed from the start, inched closer between horses two wide on the far turn then failed to sustain that bid. PATIO PARTY pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. JUSTIN'S QUEST offered a mild bid three wide on the far turn then came up empty. TAMANRASSETT was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Justin's Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Scorsese
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, between horses, 2 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Silence
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, 5 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 4 wide,
